abstract: The results of the software module "Virtual Physics Laboratory" were presented in the Higher Education system of the International University of Information Technologies (IITU). The information technology design and development, the structure of the virtual laboratory and its place in the system of Higher Education of IITU were described the same way as the principal regimes of operation of the program module in the system and methods for its use in the educational process.
meta: Conference: 8th International Conference on Application Of Information And Communication Technologies
